title: Lesson 03 - One Minute Norwegian
description: In lesson 3 of One Minute Norwegian you will learn to say that you can speak a little Norwegian. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Norwegian at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. One Minute Norwegian is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
